Source.Name: Visual Studio Code
Source.Summary: Visual Studio Code is a source-code editor made by Microsoft
Source.Description: Visual Studio Code combines the simplicity of a source code editor with powerful developer tooling, like IntelliSense code completion and debugging. First and foremost, it is an editor that gets out of your way. The delightfully frictionless edit-build-debug cycle means less time fiddling with your environment, and more time executing on your ideas.

Update.Comment: Add Microsoft Visual Studio Code version 1.57.1 released on June 17th 2021
Update.Name: Phillip Strefling
